food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys like to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 👟 You slip on my skin sometimes!

food.question: I am white and cold. I am good in a cone. What am I?
I am round and orange. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 👀 Eating me is good for your eyes!

food.question: I am long and brown. You cook me in a pan with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can eat me as french fries!

food.question: I am round and red, sometimes green. Doctors say I keep them away. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 A worm sometimes lives in me!
🍎 An apple a day keeps the doctors away.

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. What am I?
I am made from milk. I can be hard or soft and you can grate me. What am I?
I am a drink that is white. Baby cows drink me and you can have me with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 You can pour me on cereal

food.question: I'm crunchy and fun, often shaped like rings. I come in a bag, what am I?

hints.text: 🍟 Sometimes I look like fries or other shapes.
🥔 I can be made from potatoes
🧂 People like to eat me when watching TV.

food.question: I am made of dough, and baked in the oven. You can put jam or peanut butter on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I can be white or brown.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.

weather.question: I am big and bright and yellow in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 I am like a big flower in the sky.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?
I am cold and white and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ☃️ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I'm around.

weather.question: I make the trees dance and the flags wave. What am I?

hints.text: 🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
💨 I can blow your hat off.

weather.question: I'm hot and bright, but I go away at night. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am a kind of feeling, and the sun provides it.
🌡️ When it is me, you might want to go swimming.

weather.question: I come after the rain and have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am an arc in the sky.
🔴 I have red, yellow, and blue.
☀️ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.

weather.question: I am very loud and come with lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ⛈️ People often get scared when they hear me.

weather.question: I am very small and frozen, and sometimes fall instead of rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am a type of ice.
🤕 If I hit you, it might hurt.

weather.question: I can be thick and make it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I'm like a cloud near the ground.
🚗 You have to drive slowly when I am around.
👻 I can make things look spooky.
